scripts.build:lambda: cp -r src/. dist/lambda/tmp && cp -r node_modules dist/lambda/tmp && cp -r package.json dist/lambda/tmp && cp libs/gnugo-3.8-amazon-linux/gnugo dist/lambda/tmp && cd dist/lambda/tmp/ && zip -r '../goSensei-lambda.zip' .
scripts.build:osx: cp -r src/. dist/osx && cp package.json dist/osx && cp libs/gnugo-3.8-osx-10.12/gnugo dist/osx
